website_summaries.verdict: The Breville One-Touch Tea Maker is without a doubt the current pinnacle of automated loose-leaf brewers for the home but it comes with a luxury price to match.
pros: The Breville One-Touch Tea Maker brews and steeps automatically
The Tea Maker also has presets to tackle a wide range of tea styles plus functions as a variable-temperature electric kettle
cons: Compared with other electric tea kettles, the Breville is expensive
The Tea Maker's carafe is only labeled in metric units

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this July 2017. You would think a product would last longer than 6 months. Every other time that I use this I get re set errors. What a pain. When it does work the water never gets hot enough. Waisted money. Bought my daughter the Mr. Coffee tea maker and it works great! Think before you buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Hayhurst

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: We really liked it at first, however it quit working after only 3 months. The customer service department either won't answer the phone or has a recorded message informing the customer that due to high call volume you have to try back another time. No email option from website only the same troubleshooting that's in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Dever

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly
customer_reviews.text: Don't get me wrong. I loved the tea maker when it worked. Unfortunately within a few months the tea basket would go up and down instead of stay immersed in the hot water. When I called breville they said I must have gotten it wet. Unplug it and turn them upside down for 24-72 hours. It took 72 hours and voila...it started working properly again. Within a week after that it went back to the same old nonsense. I have a jerry rigged a solution but it isn't a great solution. I definitely lived it when it worked. Breville customer service....not so much.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well, but has some annoying features
customer_reviews.text: It is really good automatic steeper (while not many of this kind in the market), although may be too expensive. For perfectionist it can be a torture - so many small imperfections. PROS: Nice quality materials Brews tea as expected Delayed start feature CONS: Feature "Keep warm" switches off after some short time Also "keep warm" switches off every time you lift the kettle from base. Display only shows temperature when boiling and steeping, does not display it after. Notification sound is a cheap high-pitch beeper. Buttons sometimes work on first pressing, sometimes need to press twice - still did not undertand when and why
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Certainly recommend this product, great tea maker/kettle, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I always used my sauce pan to heat water for my coffee in the morning, but then the ceramic started to chip from overuse. I upgraded to this baby and I am loving it. Its just the right size for my counter, because I didnt want a big kettle taking up space. I dont use it for tea, I may in the future but right now its just used as kettle. Programmable to start heating the same time every day, has a stay warm feature, water temp is programmable. I havent had any rust issues, and I fill with water every night, so there's aways water in it and no problems there either.
customer_reviews.author: NobodysGirl LOL

customer_reviews.title: I will never own another teapot
customer_reviews.text: This tea maker is AMAZING. My husband bought this for me for Christmas and it is the best. With one touch it heats water to the perfect temperature, lowers the basket and steeps tea for exactly the right amount of time. Or you can just heat the water to the right temperature for your tea bags. It is so genius and I love using it and making delicious loose leaf tea. I like my tea stronger than the recommended steep time and it's so easy to customize your temp/steep time. If I could give more than 5 stars I would. Well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: ShaneM

customer_reviews.title: Pot stopped working after 6 months of use; customer support a nightmare to get ahold of
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the One Touch Tea Maker in June. Worked well but now the basket simply goes up and down and it does not heat up. Tried resetting per the website instructions with no change. Calling the Breville customer support was not great. Tried Option #1 to have them call me back. Never received a call back. Called again and gave up after 45 minutes of being on hold. Not sure how to get this fixed!

customer_reviews.title: Two years later and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I was discussing my tea kettle and realized I never wrote a review. It's been almost two years and this thing is a champ! I make about a pot/day, it's a definite work horse for boiling water, or making any of the multiple varieties of tea. It's an extravagant cost, but very well made and will last a long time. I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Crashley

customer_reviews.title: Great..... while it worked.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it while it worked. No issues in the year I was able to use it, then it stopped working. Contacted Breville, I was supposed to respond to an email with information on it, I responded and then crickets. Numerous unanswered emails. Numerous calls with long wait times, til I gave up. If I would do it again, I'd get a third party warranty and hope that it broke down after the original warranty because it doesn't seem like they are any help. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: honestly

customer_reviews.title: It makes absolutely perfect tea and is completely idiot proof
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat of a tea novice and have been trying various teas and brewing methods. I read in the reviews that this was worth the $200 it cost, so I decided to buy it. The reviews were right. This is a superbly engineered appliance and is very well made. It makes absolutely perfect tea and is completely idiot proof. You don't have to watch it. You don't have to use a timer. You just pour in the water, press a button, and enjoy a perfect cup of tea in minutes. I know this is a lot of money for a machine to brew tea. But, if you like tea, this is worth every penny. I'm glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: William Mellone

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Platic pieces, even if bpa-free, this is not very appealing. After three runs, still smells bad. AND, the bottom has white hard water spots, even though I used bottled spring water. AND, the carafe is very heavy before you fill it water... which is no picnic afterwards. FINALLY, I dialed Breville, and waited one hour (YES, ONE HOUR), before I had to switch over to another incoming call. THAT was the final straw.
customer_reviews.author: Tal

customer_reviews.title: Broke in one year
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! After a year the tea basket stuck at the bottom and the water won't boil. All I could see is the words " SEE FEE " on the little screen. Wow, $200+ tea maker good for one year!! I've called the customer service # and on hold well over an hour and on their website, this expensive item does not existed on any of the choice window and there's no window to write in the trouble item. Walk away...
customer_reviews.author: Kai H Mui

customer_reviews.title: Buy this item if you like great tea
customer_reviews.text: After looking at many different tea "makers" and tea "pots" I found this Breville unit at a great price and bought it for my wife's birthday. It works great and makes it simple to control the time and temperature for various brews. There are presets for time and temp an custom settings. The tea comes out the same each and every time you brew it. The system is easy to clean and easy to operate. The only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 stars is the size. It is hard to do a single cup of tea at a time. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: Very enjoyable purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have been a tea drinker all my adult life. This device is great. I set it up in the morning, do some chores, and catch up with computer, news, hobbies, reading, with 2 or 3 cups of tea to keep me warm and cheerful. The brewing process is fun to watch, the device is easy to clean, simple mechanism should be reliable. The flask has great - thin - German glass. The design and mechanism are more than a decade old and well-proven. If you are a regular tea drinker and can deal with the price, you should consider giving yourself this treat.
customer_reviews.author: genie

customer_reviews.title: Quality, well built kettle
customer_reviews.text: Initially I had some serious buyer's remorse when I placed this order. I figured once it got here I would try it out and confirm that $200+ is a crazy amount of money to spend on a tea kettle. What was I thinking? Doesn't matter what I was thinking then- what I'm thinking now is this is worth every penny. There are many options- strong, green, use as a plain ole kettle to heat water. I make quite a lot of tea everyday and this saves me a lot of time. Quality build also. I have zero regrets. Bonus! I didn't realize it has an auto start function, too. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: rita schott

customer_reviews.title: Not At All Worth the Price, But Buy it Anyway!
customer_reviews.text: Can you make great tea with a tiny bit of careful attention to detail, cheap infuser and great quality tea leaves? Absolutely. Can you justify the price for this thing? Probably not. Would I buy this again? You bet. It makes an outstanding, repeatably excellent tea and the process is just fun to watch. Easy to use, easy to clean, and it is a conversation piece in our kitchen (and will be soon in my office). My technophobe wife figured this out in 1 minute and now uses it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: JDJeff

customer_reviews.title: Always Tea Time!
customer_reviews.text: I’m an all day tea drinker. I just fill it with water and keep the cup filled. Caffein or herbal-if I get distracted over time, Adding reheated water in the push of a button. Takes seconds to reheat up. Love the features. Use them all the time. Had it over a year and still love it. Used it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Torpey

customer_reviews.title: This is my most used appliance.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned mine since June 2013 and use it 4 or 5 times a day for French Press and teas. I’ve also given a couple for wedding presents. It still looks new and functions perfectly. I am extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Professor Longhair

customer_reviews.title: NOT for making one cuppa at a time.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, quality stuff, after all it’s Breville, HOWEVER, if you’re single like me you can’t just make one cup of tea! There’s a minimum amount of water you can put it and its more than I need, so, unless you have company, all I do is use it to boil water for now...
customer_reviews.author: LeeBee

customer_reviews.title: Lats a very LONG time!
customer_reviews.text: I just went back into our purchase history because we couldn't remember how long ago we bought this....it was 2012!!! This kettle still works a good as it did the first day, no matter if we make hot water or tea. The writing has worn off some of the button lol - but we know which ones do what after so many years. Will gladly purchase again if this one ever breaks! Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Winglet

customer_reviews.title: Worked only for 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Really didn’t expect from this brand! Stopped working after 2 weeks. I was so happy that was in eligible period to return!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ayub

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in less than 90 days of purchase
customer_reviews.text: The temperature sensor apparently failed. It turns itself Off within seconds of turning ON. Tried several times. I will certainly not recommend anyone to buy this expensive item. The RETURN period ends in 30 days of purchase which I think is not right. Anything over $100 should have a 90 day trial period.
customer_reviews.author: Cali guy

customer_reviews.title: Great for loose leaf tea lovers
customer_reviews.text: If you drink lots of tea, this appliance is worth the money. It brews a great pot of tea and keeps it hot for an hour. It has lots of temperature and brewing time settings and can be programmed to brew a pot at a specific time. The brewing mechanism works with magnets to raise and lower the brewing basket, which is pretty neat. If you leave black tea in it like I do, it will become stained brown though I haven’t noticed this leaving any taste even when I brew green teas. You can clean it with Breville’s spends cleaning packets or you can use a mix of Oxyclean and washing soda, which is what the Breville packets contain.
customer_reviews.author: piros444

customer_reviews.title: Breville's Tea Pot
customer_reviews.text: I like this teapot a lot. It gives you several choices for different types of tea to be brewed. The brewing time is good, and the tea tastes very good. I use loose leaf chai tea leaves, they give you a spoon to use to measure the tea into the basket. Once you have the tea in the basket and the lid on. You hit the tea botton and it brews you a good pot of tea!!
customer_reviews.author: susan shatraw

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crapola
customer_reviews.text: Went crazy on me right after the return window closed (only used 5 or 6 times) basket keeps going up and down and just flashes a nonsense code. Manual is worthless for troubleshooting...going in the trash. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a wedding present for my sister. It was pricey! But she drinks hot tea daily and the video sold me. It claims it makes all different types of tea to their designated temperature and full quality--not a tea drink so whatever. My sister says this is some of the best tea she has had in her life besides being overseas. She previously had a tea maker that just boiled hot water and she steeped herself. She says this is the best wedding present she got...and she would tell me the truth. It is worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Of My All Time Favorite Kitchen Machines
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine, I am a big herbal tea drinker and this is better then a coffee maker for me. I love having it set to a certain time to steep. I love the different strength settings, and the custom features. Also keep warm is great as well. It is made very well like all Breville products are. I wish Breville would have a longer warranty on their products though. But overall I love this machine and use it pretty much daily.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tea maker, be careful not to break the glass kettle
customer_reviews.text: I love love love my breville, makes perfect tea every time. The system is functional and works great. I like the keep warm function a lot. My only complaint is the lack of availability of a replacement kettle. I broke the glass on my last one dropping it into my sink. Almost every other part of the system can be re-purchased as an individual part, except the glass kettle, which is a little frustrating as I had to buy the whole system again.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: No replacement part fore kettle
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, but if you break the glass kettle, you're out of luck. You can buy a replacement part for almost every part of this tea maker, but Breville does not sell a replacement kettle. It's extremely short-sighted since it is the part that will most likely break. They want you to buy another one if you break the glass kettle.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: 5 years and running strong!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this tea maker over five years, and it works as well now as it did out of the box. This tea maker is unparalleled in its customization options and durability. It actually looks brand new as well, but only after I use the cleaning tabs to get rid of tea stain. I’ve even been considering getting another Breville machine to dedicate to green teas, as I prefer to dedicate pots to types of tea brewed. I’ve searched for a cheaper alternative to the Breville tea maker, but there is nothing on the market that even comes close.
customer_reviews.author: hershel

customer_reviews.title: so the price was better here. Still I waited
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to buy a teapot that was so expensive. I saw it at a tea store for 400$, so the price was better here. Still I waited. I wanted hot tea in the evening and ice tea during the day. It is easy to use and easy to clean. I can brew my whole leaf tea several times and get a good cup each time. I am glad I bought it. I also got the insurance offered by Amazon, just incase.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Silloway

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. It was great when it worked
customer_reviews.text: This is my second breville tea maker, With the first one, the heating element failed and lasted just past the warranty and now this one also has failed in that the temperature gauge does not work so it won't heat...very disappointed. It was great when it worked.....
customer_reviews.author: gwendolyn faasen

customer_reviews.title: Unique, Expensive. and Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: For tea drinkers, daily drinkers especially, this is heavenly. Whatever type of tea one makes, even herbal, the tea always will come out just right, with temperature and steeping time exactly as expected. It keeps the pot warmed to the right temperature if making multiple cups for oneself. It can make multiple cups or just a pot for one person. It cleans very easily and quickly. Why is this the only one of its type that does all it does, that I don't know.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for 4+ years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tea kettle for my wife in December of 2015. It was in heavy use, used at least twice a day, and worked perfectly up until this week, March 2020. I think that's pretty impressive. Something is happening where the heating cycle no longer heats the water until the desired temperature. It turns the heating off before the water reaches the desired temp. It's sad, but I will probably be buying the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wall

customer_reviews.title: Makes a good, consistent pot of tea
customer_reviews.text: I like this tea robot a lot. There are a few things I'd change: the timer isn't as thoughtfully designed as any coffee maker timer I've ever used and the "keep warm" feature has to be turned back on again every time you lift the carafe to pour tea. Other than those rather niggling issues it makes tea quickly and reliably. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy-to-use
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for over five years now, and it's still going strong. I just cleaned it, in fact, and was thinking of how clever the design is. It can't be submerged in water to wash it, but you can still manage to clean it in the sink by filling it with water, scrubbing the inside, and pouring and rinsing. The heating element is deep in the bottom, so it's a bit protected. The Breville is simple to use and makes it easy to brew a good pot of tea. My review is missing one star because I wish the top of the submersible basket was made of something other than plastic, though it's BPA free.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to spend so much money but this tea maker is wonderful and I would purchase it again. I make tea every day and this is completely automatic. After filling the carafe with water and the basket with tea, just set the brew time and strength and walk away. The basket lowers itself once the water is the right temperature, and it rises once the brewing has finished. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handle deteriorates overtime, just not fast enough for warranty
customer_reviews.text: Acrylic handle deteriorates and is starting to break. Of course, I didn't notice it till 1 month after the warranty was up. For the price, this honestly should be a two year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and worth every penny! I bought this Breville tea maker in 2013 and have used it at least twice every day and often three or four times in a day without any issues at all. It makes it so convenient to have fresh whole leaf tea, and it makes a perfect pot every time. I put the cover, basket and basket cover in the top rack of the dishwasher every night and use Bar Keeper's Friend to clean the stainless bottom and basket bar. If it ever does break, I will order another one in an instant.
customer_reviews.author: FL Gator

customer_reviews.title: Clock Function for Auto Brew
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is a good product. I like the fact that it will brew green tea just enough if you are the type of person that gets an upset stomach from over brewed green tea. My particular issue is that it doesn't seem to be able to keep accurate time for auto-brew. I usually set it some 15-20 minutes ahead and it seems to lose substantial time between auto brews. I have to reset the clock almost every auto-brew set. The other issue is I don't think it ever looks clean at the bottom of the pot if that's a big deal for you unless you hand wipe it every day, since you can't put the pot in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Logan&Sarabeth

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this for me for Christmas/birthday and it's fantastic! It has multiple different features for different types of teas a keep warm feature and if I want to reheat it I can just hit hot water and it warms in less than five minutes. Super awesome for a family of tea lovers regularly on the go. Highly recommend using filtered water both for taste and cleanliness as it will build hard water up but it also comes with a packet of cleaner which we haven't even needed to use yet.
customer_reviews.author: Scootch4411

customer_reviews.title: Well-built appliance for serious tea lovers
customer_reviews.text: Great tea maker! It takes all the guesswork out of how to make a perfect cup of tea, no matter what type of leaves you choose. The infusion quality is consistently great, and brewing loose leaf tea provides you with a remarkably better tasting experience. I personally use it primarily for white tea. The programmable function allows you to wake up to fresh made tea every morning - a real treat! The appliance has a confident build quality - worthy it's hefty price tag. I expect it to last many years of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Replacement after 5 Years
customer_reviews.text: We must like it as it is the replacement for the one we had for 5 years. A favorite of my husband who is a Coffee Drinker, I am a Tea drinker.
customer_reviews.author: Fusun D. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Love the way it works. It brews my tea perfectly and it doesn’t matter if I get distracted. Without it, I’d leave the bag brewing too long and come back to a cold cup of overly strong tea. Perfect for company, I can set it to brew while I welcome my guests. Or, I can set it to automatically brew in the morning to have it ready when I get up.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Rea

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t much of a tea drinker until after I purchased this product. I originally got it for my son and boyfriend because they like tea and I knew nothing with regards to preparing differant types of teas. This little kitchen gadget has taken all the guess work out of making tea. My boyfriend stated after drinking his first cup that it was the best cup of tea that he has ever had, but he says the same about my cooking also...LOL!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed.
customer_reviews.text: One must purchase new one if glass jug breaks, everything else is great. One can wash it anyway except in dish washer if you put silicone sealer around its rubber gasket, and a stick on pad on its bottom. Likewise, to stop the 60 minute countdown after it is finished brewing press the timer key. It will then shut down in 3 minutes and not in manual. Love the products sold by Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: RON POWERS

customer_reviews.title: Great green tea -  but must be treated with care
customer_reviews.text: Like it, but make sure to handle with care. It is well made but the top can't be put into any kind of water or have water drops on the bottom.. It like driving an expense car... So if you are a careful person, great item.. best tasting green tea you will ever have... I hated green tea until I tasted it from this unit.. But if you seem to break alot of items being in a rush... use an cheap coffee maker..
customer_reviews.author: mom of two beautiful children

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, used it for a month and convinced myself I didn't need it. Returned it. Thought about it almost every day since returning it and have now re-purchased for keeps. Fantastic kettle for someone who enjoys tea!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Maker
customer_reviews.text: Great automatic tea maker. You can set different temperatures and steep time which varies with the type of tea you are drinking. This is the 2nd one we have purchased and use it all the time. Only issue is you have to be careful with the glass carafe...can't get it wet/submerge it. If the carafe breaks, there are no replacements...must buy a whole new one. The base can be purchased separately along with extra tea baskets and lid. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tea maker!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely, in every way. I was impressed with the weight and quality look right out of the box. The Magnetic glide basket is a pleasure to watch. I usually have several kinds of teas on hand and it's nice with not having to fuss around with different temps and brewing times. This bad boy does everything I need with a touch of a button. Was a wonderful 'from me to me' Christmas gift! I have SUCH good taste. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Tea made with perfection every morning when you wake up
customer_reviews.text: 2nd tea maker. The first one died after 5 years of excellent daily service. I was being frugal and for 6 m was trying not to buy it but I finally just did and am so happy I did. If you love tea, just splurge on this. Tea done beautifully every time! Ready when you wake up! Can’t beat that
customer_reviews.author: Robyn P.

customer_reviews.title: The Ferrari of tea kettles
customer_reviews.text: This is my second kettle. Warms tea to the perfect temperature and looks like a sports car on my countertop. I honestly don’t know how a daily tea drinker such as myself has lived without it for so long. Totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Angel

customer_reviews.title: So surprised how much I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It seems really silly to spend this amount of money when you can just boil water and pour it over tea - which I have done for decades. What I like about this is the precision of the temperatures and the steeping which definitely makes better tea. I absolutely love the program ahead feature so I wake up to the perfect cup of tea. It definitely gets me out of bed knowing that there is tea waiting for me and if I wait too long it will cool.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: I feel like a LEGIT tea drinker
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. I feel like a real tea drinker since I’m tasting tea as intended at the right temp and steeping time. When I don’t have the time, or attention span to do the ritual of tea making. Love it <3 Easy to clean if you follow directions. Not A complaint yet. Had it for less than a month but have been using daily
customer_reviews.author: Rachel V.

customer_reviews.title: So cool.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome!! Loads of features. If you drink a fair amount of tea, I'd say it's a must! Everything is automatic. Just add water and tea. Push a few buttons and it will make a perfect tea. The auto lower/raise of the basket makes the tea stay for the right amount of time. Can select for a list of pre programed tea types and even change the strength of the brew. Or make a custom pot of tea! It's digital and heats fast. I'd highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: I'm not sure what makes her happier this, or her new I pad
customer_reviews.text: Makes tea faster than my coffee maker makes coffee. My wife loves this thing. I'm not sure what makes her happier this, or her new I pad. But at least she doesn't bring the tea maker to bed. The tea is great. And friends are amazed by this thing when they come over.
customer_reviews.author: wolf

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Maker
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tea pot out there. I am a tea lover. This has made all the difference when brewing tea leafs. If you are a tea lover this is what you need. Easy to use, brews perfect tea at the perfect temperatures and easy to use. Also, you can boil water at different temperatures as well. Perfect! Worth the money if you love tea.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cup of Tea
customer_reviews.text: I use this tea maker at least once or twice every day. I drink green tea most often, but also drink black, rooibus, white and herbal teas. I also mix teas such as green and pineapple, black and mint, or hibiscus and peach rooibus. The bottom line is this: 1) Since it makes a perfect cup of tea, your health will be improved or maintained because you will drink a lot more tea and a lot less other beverages such as coffee, milk, alcohol, soda, fruit juice, etc. 2) since it's makes tea automatically, it allows one to do other things while cooking without worrying about monitoring boiling water or steeping tea.
customer_reviews.author: Stockinv

customer_reviews.title: The tea maker I've been waiting for. It makes tea fast, easy, and at the right temperature. Very easy to clean afterwards
customer_reviews.text: This is the tea maker I've been waiting for. It's so easy to brew tea at just the right temperature. It's also easy to clean, which is important to me. I just run some water over the basket and depending on what tea I was making, it can make the kitchen smell wonderful. The whole thing is so automatic that it makes making tea a pleasure. I got it because drinking tea is healthy and I want to make it as easy and inviting as possible. This does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Bold Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Makes great tea
customer_reviews.text: I love this versatile tea maker. I had one for 5 years but sadly broke the glass carafe when I banged it against the kitchen cabinet. I was not able to replace the carafe, so I bought an identical model. It has preset temperature and time controls for green, black, herbal, oolong and white teas. Plus you can set a customized time and/or temperature. I drink tea every day, and this makes me happy to have.
customer_reviews.author: TerryH

customer_reviews.title: If you drink tea, you have to have this!
customer_reviews.text: We drink a lot of tea, and loose leaf is the best, not to mention you can get organic in loose leaf. The settings allow you to make a perfect pot of tea every time. Nothing worse than burnt Green tea... Not with the Breville! If you drink tea, you have to have this!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Reed

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Been using for two months - if you love tea you gotta get this product. I paid full price for it and am not getting anything for the review - its just an awesome idea executed very well. With the timer set, there is tea ready for me in the morning if I want a change from coffee. Drinking more tea now too. If I make too much, it goes right into the fridge for iced tea later. Its a great way to explore different teas and ensuring that you are tasting that tea brewed at the right temperature and steeped for the correct duration.
customer_reviews.author: Graceman

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect! Don't let the relatively high price deter you. If you drink tea daily, this is worth every penny. I am even thinking of getting a second one for my office.
customer_reviews.author: eyeinzsky75

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the Lazy Tea Snob
customer_reviews.text: I love tea. And as I've gotten a bit older, and learned and tasted a bit more; I've become a bit of a tea snob. At least enough to learn that I far prefer the flavor of well made, high quality loose leaf teas to that of bagged tea. But I'm also often a bit lazy, and it's a pain to make tea properly every time I feel like having a couple of cups. That's where this comes in. PROS The Breville makes a really good cup of tea, with minimum effort and work. It's also just incredibly cool. CONS You could really make the tea yourself for a lot less money. The glass carafe is somewhat difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.author: J. John

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think about the price tag; you deserve this
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this for a couple of years. It takes the human element out of something so ritualized, like tea-making. But if you’re ready to acknowledge that different teas require different temperatures and brewing times, then maybe you’ll see that this is a great option for you. It’s very consistent and brews it exactly towards specifications, customizable as well.
customer_reviews.author: jaime rivera

customer_reviews.title: Love the tea, Notteh  usefull life of Pot
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing device. Tea, making and rebrewing using same tea grounds, to lessen caffeine, BUT we have just purchased our 3 unit, because the heating element in the pots last only about 26 months. As I said above this has happened twice now, around the 2 year to 26 month period. Still having said that we are buying an 3rd.
customer_reviews.author: TaLL1

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have for any Tea Drinker!
customer_reviews.text: What more could you ever ask for in a tea maker? This automatic wonder does it all: heats water, sets temperature, lowers tea leaf hopper, and best of all, makes excellent tea according to your specifications. All you teally have to do is power it on, add the water, tea, set your preferences (e.g., green, black), and hit the start button!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It's one of my favorite toys
customer_reviews.text: Not only is the tea this brews amazing, but it is also like a mini science experiment with clear glass, boiling water, and a tea basket that glides down on a magnetic column to steep the tea for the perfect amount of time. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rezanate

customer_reviews.title: Still loving it after about an year of usage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product about an year ago and I couldn't be happier. I drink tea 2~3 times daily and this kettle saved me countless hours of tea-brewing. I even made a mistake of putting this thing in the dishwasher once but it still worked once it dried. Edit 1, I put it in dish washer one more time, still works.
customer_reviews.author: Hee seung Ro

customer_reviews.title: ... someone in your family that claims to make the best tea on the planet then be prepared to hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have someone in your family that claims to make the best tea on the planet then be prepared to hurt their feelings because there isn't any tea that tastes better than this. I never made tea before because after cooking all evening and my burners full you grab a coke at my house. Not anymore I make tea everyday now and I bought a ice machine to go next to it . Now I don't feel guilty about being lazy about making my family tea! This is soooooooooo worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: RAINBOW BRIGHT DREAMS

customer_reviews.title: Making tea has never been easier
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I do not have to babysit my tea to ensure the correct temperature is brewing my blend. Making tea at the correct temperature makes all the difference. Cleaning the kettle is very easy. Just be sure not to submerge the bottom of the kettle and water.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cole

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tea maker.
customer_reviews.text: Great tea maker. Best I've ever tried. Tea tastes wonderful. Program ability is very nice to have. I use the Breville cleaner to clean the pot. I'm really glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Kreative Krafter

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect! The presets and the auto submersion of the tea holder.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it! How quick it heats, how it has the presets, the magnetic grip of the basket and of course the sleek look. Everyone that’s sees it has to ask me about it, use it everyday when a few of us are having tea or plan on having more than one cup,
customer_reviews.author: minerva

customer_reviews.title: Breville Tea maker
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my Breville Tea Maker. My sister-in-law had one and she sold me on it. I love the one touch feature. I have put the water in, tea in the basket so I have only to press the button to start the tea maker in the morning. I enjoy watching the basket lower into the hot water to steep and then raise when it is done. The keep warm feature is also a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Beth Flory

customer_reviews.title: Makes deliciously perfect tea every time period
customer_reviews.text: Makes the perfect cup of tea! I have had this for the last 6 years and it still works as well as it did the 1st day I got it. It brews the perfect cup - No matter what kind of tea it is. And it keeps the pot warm for over an hour. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: BerryChowTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Effortless Great Tea!
customer_reviews.text: BEST TEA EVER! I'm using Rishi Tea and just made the best cup of tea! What a time saver. Especially if you want a second or third steep. It's effortless. You run a hot water cycle to clean it and clean the basket. Put your tea in, fill with water, pick your tea type and steep time. So wonderful! No more waisted cups from steeping too long or lack of time to steep again. The sound is not bad. I don't think it would wake a baby in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Died at the 2 year mark
customer_reviews.text: Another Breville product dies on me. Not purchasing from Breville anymore. This product just shuts off and won't work anymore. It's so frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Catzguz

customer_reviews.title: Breville Through and Through
customer_reviews.text: Great tea - green, black, white, red, I drink them all - and ready for me when I get up in the morning. Not just a water boiler.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Natural

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing.
customer_reviews.text: what's not to like? It's perfect. The only way this could be better is if you could hook it to a water source, give it functioning arms and teach it to speak so you can just tell it to make you some tea and it will prep it's self.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: The Breville is a well-designed product with one flaw. I use it in my office for only white or green teas. It is very flexible, enabling precise and individual steeping time, water temperature and reheating, which is what I need. What bothers me is the tannin build-up on metal surfaces, which takes place within weeks and affects the taste (and color)of the water. The suggested fixes - boiling lemons, baking powder or vinegar - have not been effective, and I haven't found a solution as yet. This has limited my enjoyment and use of this otherwise excellent product. Help, anyone?
customer_reviews.author: Strafford11

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much I bought two
customer_reviews.text: I love this teapot! I have one at home and another at the office. It makes perfect tea every time. Cleaning it is a challenge so I kind of just rinse it out, but I use both everyday.
customer_reviews.author: virginialawyermom

customer_reviews.title: Takes the guesswork out for proper tea
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one, the first one was still working perfectly until we broke the carafe. This is an awesome teacher maker that takes the guesswork out of temps and times. If you live your tea I highly recommend this tea maker, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dailey

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect teas by setting and walking away!
customer_reviews.text: High quality tea is only as good as the steep time, and brew temp. This machine does this all for you without having to stand by it and wait for a timer. set it and go. so easy, makes brewing high quality tea simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used Product sold as new!
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! Purchased this tea maker for my husband for Father’s Day. The product arrived with tea leaves in the tea basket. The jug was wet on the interior. The photos are of the tea maker immediately after unboxing. This tea maker was clearly used!
customer_reviews.author: P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best tea maker I've ever had.
customer_reviews.text: I waited awhile before writing this evaluation. My first cup of tea made with this just tasted "clean and crisp". Hard to describe - but very positive. It has taken some experimenting to decide just how many scoops of tea to add to each different type of tea. But even when I didn't get it quite right the tea was still quite drinkable. So far no problems of any sort. I have found the other reviews to be helpful - for example take care of the glass pitcher because if it breaks you have to buy an entire new unit! So I take care.
customer_reviews.author: chaikikombe

customer_reviews.title: ... A LOT (over a dozen) off electric kettles (we love hot tea in our family
customer_reviews.text: I've owned A LOT (over a dozen) off electric kettles (we love hot tea in our family :o)) and this one is my all time favorite. No plastic smell, temperature display, fast heating, delayed start setting (which is great when you don't have to wait in the morning for you freshly brewed tea-because it's waiting for you). Love it! Recomend!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Finer teas tend to infiltrate the kettle from the basket ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife 2 years ago for Christmas. She uses it every day and it just works. Finer teas tend to infiltrate the kettle from the basket but the strainer in the kettle catches most of this.
customer_reviews.author: James Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Great Tea Maker
customer_reviews.text: We love this tea maker. This is actually the second one we purchased after the first was broken by my father in a recent move to our new home. Wouldn’t even consider buying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: It's Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I was so hesitant to spend this much on a tea kettle... but after researching for weeks, I kept coming back to the Breville One Touch. I love that this kettle does it all! The automatic lift of the steeper basket is the icing on the cake - a perfect cup of tea all the way to the end of the pot! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Fred Lawrence
customer_reviews.text: This tea kettle is just fantastic. It is easy to use. The tea maker let you choose the brewing strength. You mearly select the type of tea you want to make, and the tea maker heats the water to the correct temperature for the type of tea. Once the water reaches the correct temperature, the tea maker lower the basket containing the tea automatically into the water, and at the correct time, it auto- lifts the basket out of the water to prevent oversleeping. it has a warmer that keep the tea warm for up to 60 minutes. This thing is fascinating.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Tea-aholic drinkers BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Makes the perfect cup of tea every time! Highly recommend for the avid tea drinker. Perfect temperature and perfectly steeped. Fun to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Miller

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great 'cuppa'. Can be customized to your preference for ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great 'cuppa'. Can be customized to your preference for any type of tea or use the presets. The mechanism for moving the tea caddy up and down is ingenious. Makes a fast pot of hot water when needed (like for tea bags). Just a bit difficult to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tea as it should taste
customer_reviews.text: Takes any regular tea bags (2 for the amount under the max water allowed) and turns into smoothest tea you will find. Works great. Will bring lots of joy during the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome but beware of fragile pitcher! Break it and the entire $200 unit have to be replace!
customer_reviews.text: We love the design but we had to get another one because the glass pitcher broke after two years. No replacemt pitcher!! Had to replace the Entire unit!
customer_reviews.author: Yum Yum

customer_reviews.title: Makes wonderful tea
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a Mother's Day gift. All I can say is this until takes the guess work out of making great tea. I tried to make tea by boiling water and it never turned out. With this unit, I put the tea in the basket, select the type of tea and I am done. I've enjoyed perfect tea every night for the past month. Is this a little pricy, yes, but I can make a great cup of tea.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Pleased as Punch!  or should I say, tea?
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my Breville teamaker! I can quickly and easily make tea all day if I wanna! Cleanup is a breeze. I quit coffee and now I can wake up to a fresh pot of tea every morning, just like the coffee drinkers. It's pricey, but I paid with the Amazon 6 month no interest, so I just pay a little each month till it's paid off. I have to admit, I did have to tweak the timing for different teas. I cannot brew my tea at the recommended, pre-set times. That doesn't work for me. But after you customize to your desired times, it's all good! Buy this and enjoy tea, quickly and effortlessly!
customer_reviews.author: Coily

customer_reviews.title: TEA!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tea maker for loose tea. can brew up to 10 minutes, Has different water temperatures for Green, White, Black, Herb, Oolong, and Custom. It also has different times, Mild = 3min, Med = 4min Strong = 5/6mins. I usually go 10 minutes for loose Organic tea. I like my tea strong though. Also is great for just heating up water. I usually just clean it by wiping it with a towel and the rust or iron comes off. A lot easier process then a cheap Tea maker I had before.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great tea maker, with some less than easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: White, Green, Black. Mild, medium, or dark. The temperature settings and time settings permit a perfect cup of tea, or you can customize. Why is it 4 vs 5 stars? Because my 10 year old daughter immersed the tea container in water and destroyed the first one. It would be great if we could have this functionality and ease of cleaning, unfortunately ease of cleaning does not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: GDoC63

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Eleven months in and this thing works great! Love that I can program it to turn on in the morning and the different temperature settings for different types of tea.
customer_reviews.author: Conspicuous Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Uses less tea leaves than usual
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a French Press to make my tea and I like Rishi but I felt I had to use a lot of tea to get the flavor just right. The instructions on the Breville tell you to use their scoop per cup which is really only about a 1/2 TBS so I do and can get many more cups of tea than usual. In addition, I have used my tea leaves several times before tossing so in that regard I like it. I wish the Keep Warm feature worked all day long and not just the first 60 minutes after brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie H

product_meta.title: Breville BTM800XL One-Touch Tea Maker
product_meta.description: Relaxation from Start to Finish The Breville Tea Maker is a revolutionary tea experience. The fully automated tea basket moves down, then up, gently agitating the leaves to precisely infuse your tea. Push the basket button and watch the basket cycle in and out of immersion. Seeing is believing. Different tea varietals such as black, green, white and oolong require exact water temperatures and controlled brew times to allow their unique flavors and aromas to develop during brewing. The Tea Maker eliminates the guesswork so you can enjoy a perfect cup of tea, every time. Breville One-Touch Tea Maker: Tea Basket Cycle auto lowers and lifts tea to brewAuto Start begins brew at pre-selected timeVariable Tea Strength controls steeping timeVariable Temperature for all tea varietalsAccurate Temperature Sensor with real-time displayDimensions: The dimensions are 10.7 x 6 x 11 inches.A Closer Look: Fully programmable for all types of tea, water temperatures and steep times. The moving tea basket allows water to circulate freely around the individual tea leaves for maximum infusion. Set the timer and wake up to the aroma of your favorite brew. The German-made Schott glass kettle is durable and stain resistant.Take Care: Clean with a water and vinegar solution on the Hot Water setting.Made in the USA or Imported. Power : 1500 Watts.
feature_bullets: Tea Basket Cycle - Auto Lowers and Lifts
Auto Start. Construction Materials - Brushed Stainless Steel Power Base
Variable temperature control; Jug Capacity: 51 oz.
Time Since Brew - LCD timer; LCD Display: Accurate temperature sensor with real time display to monitor progress.
Settings: 5 Pre Programmed Settings. Auto shut off and boil dry protection. Voltage: 110–120 Volts.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,849 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
